name: Locality_localeStringWithRandomTest
description: Tests for the Locality class, focusing on the localeStringWithRandom method and allSupportedLocales method.

test_cases.name: allSupportedLocales
test_cases.description: Tests the allSupportedLocales method to ensure it returns a list of 87 locales.

test_cases.name: localeStringWithRandom
test_cases.description: Tests the localeStringWithRandom method to ensure it returns a locale string that is contained within the list of all supported locales.
